summary: Completed comprehensive end-to-end testing of GEO SaaS tool. All core features working correctly including lead capture, website analysis with Claude AI, report generation, and PDF export. Both backend APIs and frontend UI are fully functional.
passed_tests: Lead creation with all required fields (firstName, lastName, email, url)
Analysis job creation and background processing
Job status polling with progress tracking (pending -> processing -> completed)
Claude AI integration for 8 GEO criteria analysis (generated scores and recommendations)
Report generation with scores (Global Score: 1.7-2.3/10) and recommendations (10-11 items)
Report viewing page with all three tabs (Scores, Recommendations, Analysis)
PDF download functionality (5617 bytes PDF generated)
Dashboard page showing all leads and reports (2 leads displayed)
Complete navigation flow (Landing -> Analysis -> Report -> Dashboard -> Landing)
Form validation and submission with proper data-testid attributes
